1370: Emgelberna moved to Slyck straet.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Gheram at age 19 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Myrthel in 1371 at age 20.
1373: Gave birth to Sanse in 1373 at age 22.
1374: Gave birth to Hatebrandus in 1374 at age 23.
1375: Gave birth to Verthwi in 1375 at age 24.
1376: Gave birth to Robbrecht in 1376 at age 25.
Lost son Robbrecht when Robbrecht was 1 years old.
1377: Gave birth to Wolfraem in 1377 at age 26.
Lost son Sanse when Sanse was 5 years old.
1379: Gave birth to Walramus in 1379 at age 28.
1382: Gave birth to Alretieren in 1382 at age 31.
1385: Lost daughter Alretieren when Alretieren was 4 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1386: Lost daughter Gerburgis when Gerburgis was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Gerburgis in 1386 at age 35.
